attr.title: Towards The Pantheon: Escaping Eternity
attr.desc: A prequel mystery game that follows the journey of a soldier before the events of the full-length RPG, Towards The Pantheon. Players must solve puzzles, explore bizarre environments, and make sense of the the soldier's situation.
attr.inst: Download the game (for free) here: https://connorort.itch.io/towards-the-pantheon-escaping-eternity -- extract and copy the data.win file to the port gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the game (for free) here: [https://connorort.itch.io/towards-the-pantheon-escaping-eternity](https://connorort.itch.io/towards-the-pantheon-escaping-eternity) -- extract and copy the *data.win* file to the port *gamedata* folder.
